source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Headdress of Living Brambles

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and opponent's failed interrupt attempts grant Precognition

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 399,540 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 211,037.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 399,540 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 211,037.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.8 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Increases maximum health by 1.7 million for 15 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
